    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main() {
    	int n1,n2,prevcar,a,b,p,q;
    	while(1)
    	{
    	       cin>>n1;
    	    cin>>n2;
    	    if(n1!=0 && n2!=0)
    	    {
    	     
    	    int c=0;
    	    p=n1;
    	    q=n2;
    	    
    	    prevcar=0;
    	    
    	    while(p>0 && q>0)
    	    {
    	        a=p%10;
    	        b=q%10;
    	        if(a+b>9 || (prevcar==1 && a+b==9))
    	        {
    	            prevcar=1;
    	            c++;
    	        }
    	        else
    	        prevcar=0;
    	        p=p/10;
    	        q=q/10;
    	    }
    	    if(c==0)
    	    cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
    	    else if(c>1)
    	    cout<<c<<" carry operations."<<endl;
    	    else
    	    cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
    	    }
    	    else
    	    break;
    	}
    	return 0;
    }
